title: Quantum Benchmarking Logical Circuit File Schema
description: Describes required fields for a valid Logical Circuit (TA1.5 output) file.

logical_circuit_uuid.title: Solution UUID
logical_circuit_uuid.description: The UUID of the solution being submitted as a string in 8-4-4-4-12 format.

benchmark_instance_uuid.title: Benchmark Instance UUID
benchmark_instance_uuid.description: The UUID of the benchmark instance that the solution is based on.

creation_timestamp.title: Creation Timestamp
creation_timestamp.description: Timestamp in ISO 8601 format to the second.

short_name.title: Short Name
short_name.description: A short string.  Not necessarily unique.

other_info.title: Other Information
other_info.description: An optional object with no required structure for the test performer to put other contact information or comments in.

circuit_generation_software_details.title: Circuit Generation Software Details
circuit_generation_software_details.description: An object to capture the short name and version of the software/script used to generate the logical circuit.

logical_circuit_details.title: Logical Circuit Details
logical_circuit_details.description: A URL to the OpenQASM (TBD) file containing the circuit and other details about the algorithm being implemented.
